lead_paragraph: Lurking just beneath the surface of a ruling over the detention of a Guantánamo prisoner was a sharp disagreement over the scope and limits of presidential power.
snippet: Lurking just beneath the surface of a ruling over the detention of a Guantánamo prisoner was a sharp disagreement over the scope and limits of presidential power.

headline.main: Appeals Court Backs Away From War Powers Ruling
headline.seo: Judges Undercut Ruling Giving President Broad War Powers
headline.print_headline: Appeals Court Backs Away From War Powers Ruling
